snippet.title: Wall World - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Wall World is a mining rogue-lite with tower defense elements where you will be exploring the mysterious Wall on your giant robot spider. Mine for valuable resources, upgrade your equipment to fight off hordes of monsters, and discover exotic biomes in-between attacks. Will you be able to survive and learn the secrets of the World Wall?

Wall World is now available on PC:
• Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2187290/Wall_World/
• GOG.com - https://www.gog.com/en/game/wall_world
• Epic Games Store - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/wall-world-02e132

Stay tuned:
• Twitter - https://twitter.com/alawarteam
• Discord - https://discord.gg/xZXBfwAvPA
• Facebook - https://facebook.com/alawarteam
